1112.content:
Eddie and Chelsea were in the cafeteria eating and chatting it up during the lunch period, when Raven came in with a large tray of food. One double cheeseburger, vanilla milkshake, fries and a bag of potato chips. Raven placed her tray down onto the table and her friends stared at her food and back to her, both feeling a bit puzzled.
"Wow Raven... that sure is a lot of food.", said Eddie.
Chelsea continued with,"Yeah girlfriend, what gives? What's with all the food?"
Raven gave them a smug look and said, "What? A girl can't over indulge once in awhile?"
"Well, no." said Eddie "This just seems a little excessive as all."
Raven rolled her eyes at her pals while placing her hands on her hips.
"Oh give me a break. I just wanted some junk food. I just wanted a bit more to eat today. Is that a crime?"
"Is it? Oh my goodness I hope not. I kinda want to eat a bit more for lunch as well.", Chelsea replied.
Eddie sighed as Raven sat down to eat saying, "Over eating isn't a crime Chelsea. Worse case scenario you'll get fat."
Chelsea gave out an surprised expression all across her face.
"Wait really? Is that all? In that case, I'm buying more food then! Wish I knew that years ago."
Chelsea jumped out of her chair and headed to the lunch ladies for another helping. Eddie looked twice as confused than before. Raven picked up her cheese burger and said,
"I don't know about homegirl, but I ain't getting fat from just one fattening meal.", as Raven smirked.
She took one big juicy bite out of her cheeseburger, when suddenly her future vision came in. She saw a woman that looked just like her, but incredibly obese. A massive whale of a woman. Looking like she weighed over 1000 lbs. She sat their naked with all of her fat exposed. Wide hips and thighs covering up an entire king-sized mattress with a belly so large it hung down the bed and touched the floor. This Raven was shoveling all sorts of meat and sweets into her mouth and burping without apologizing at all. Rubbing her thick, meaty rolls of her belly. Her father Victor walks in with a cake and places it on her belly.
"Mmm... about time this showed up!", said Raven as she then gobbles down the cake furiously.
Raven then snaps back to the present staring at her burger.
"Uh oh," said Eddie, "had another future vision?"
Raven puts down the burger slowly on to her plate and pushes away the entire tray away.
"Oh yeah... on second thought, I think 1 fry would enough for lunch today."
Raven picks up a fry and sits back up and then walks to class. As she left, Chelsea returned with a tray stacked high with pizza slices and a slice of cake. She sits back down and eats up her meal. She then realizes Raven left.
"Hey, Raven didn't finish her meal... guess I finish it for her!", says Chelsea as she grabs Raven cheeseburger and eats it. Eddie just gives Chelsea a weird look and and nods his head.
"What is going on today?"

As school ended, Raven was at her locker jogging in place and in a jogging attire. Chelsea with more food in her hand, this time a beef burrito, walked up Raven to ask why she left her lunch so early.
"Yo Raven, why did you leave the cafeteria? Your lunch was so good too... burp!"
Raven turned to her friend while still jogging.
"Okay Chelsea, I'll come clean. Had another future vision. When I took a bite out of my burger, right? I saw myself... I was so fat! Like fat like a dang hippo! Shoving all sorts of food into my mouth. So for now on, I'm going to exercise and diet to prevent any chunky future!"
"Well okay then, just don't over do it. Sometimes when try to prevent certain futures, you go a teensy bit overboard. Also, can I eat any of your snacks that you no longer desire?"
"Of course, Chelsea. I have a box of cookies from my dad I was about to throw away. Enjoy."
"Oooo! Gimme gimme!"
Chelsea shoved the rest of the burrito into her mouth and began chowing down on the box of cookies.
"Burp! Aw, so glad eating so much isn't illegal!", said Chelsea with crumbs all over face as she smiled. Raven rolled her eyes and began jogging down the hall, waving Chelsea goodbye.
"See ya later, girlfriend."

"Your on!"
Jackson drove the three of them down to the beach, and Rico hauled out all the ice cream, in cones, packets and boxes. They made a big pile in front of Miley, who handed Rico the money and began eating at an amazing speed.
Five minutes later, she'd devoured all the Neopolitan Meltdown Supremes.
After ten minutes, all the boxes of Vanilla Milky Whirls were empty.
She took a break after half an hour, and layed down of the sand breathing heavily. She was glad she'd eaten the warmer ice creams first, because they'd be going runny by now. She took another deep breath, and started again.
A quarter of an hour later, every cone icecream had been devoured.
Jackson and Rico couldn't resist a few bites. Finally Miley was finished. She collapsed in a heap, surrounded by empty boxes and wrappers.

It was the middle of the night in Malibu, and everyone was asleep. Except Miley. She was squirming around in her bed, not able to sleep due to a stomach-ache. She eventually sat up and plucked off a few of the buttons on her pyjama shirt. A few small rolls of fat flopped through, but she barely noticed. Miley licked her lips, still not able to get the taste of ice cream of her tongue. Remembering she could still let herself go, she walked out of her room, down the stairs and entered the cupboard for a little midnight snack. The weaker wooden floarboards near the kitchen creaked a little under her new weight.
She pulled out a chocolate cake and slowly ate it, with a few sugar-coated mini donuts. Her pyjama pants were beginning to squeeze her, so she loosened them.
After finishing the meal, Miley walked back up the stairs and caught her reflection in the mirror. The small bit of pudge she'd been loathing weeks earlier had gotten a lot bigger. Miley nervously wobbled it, but it didn't really worry her, as she knew her weight tended to yo-yo when she had a concert coming up. She slapped her hands on her newly formed love handles and giggled nervously.
"Im not calling myself fat yet, but these extra pounds have to go before Amber or Ashley see me"
She went to bed, just after marking the date on her kitten calendar. The concert was a fortnight away, and Hannah didn't have to make anymore scheduled appearances between now and then.

Lily impatiently banged on the door to Mileys dressing room.
"Come on Miley, the waves are coming!" said Lily, gripping her surfboard.
"Oh you guys know i never liked surfing"
"Is that the problem?"
"No, i cant get this dang swimsuit on!" said Miley.
Lily and Oliver waited for another ten minutes, and them Miley burst out the dressing room wearing a orange swimsuit.
"I had to stretch this shrunken thing real hard!" said Miley, pulling angain at the material around her midsection.
Oliver bent over and whispered to Lily.
"Maaaaan does she look fat!"
"Don't tell her that! It'll hurt her feelings!"
Oliver was right. Despite considering a quick diet, Miley hadn't backed down in eating junk food. Her steady diet in meat, sweets and ice creams had led to a rapid weight gain that she had become somewhat unaware of.
"She can't go out like this! She looks like a ripe orange!" said Oliver
"What are you guys talking about?" said Miley
"Nothing" said Oliver.
"Yeah, lets go" said Lily.
Although the tide was in, it was a long walk between the change area and the part of the sea were the waves were highest. The trio broke into a run, and Lily and Oliver laid the surfboards out when they reached the sea.
"Hey, were's Miley?"
Exhausted, Miley collapsed into the sand nearby. Lily ran to her aid.
"Man im so tired" said Miley, who reached into her rucksack and pulled out an ice-cream cone.
"But we only ran for about two-hundred metres! And your supposed to be really good at these short distance sprints"
"Two hundred metres? It felt like twenty miles"
Miley ate the ice cream and slowly dragged herself up.
As usual, Miley wasn't too good at surfing, and after a short swim, gave up and sat on the beach, snacking from her bag of delicious foods.
Oliver paddled with Lily as they came close to a big wave.
"Seriously Lily, you gotta admit it. Miley's gotten fat"
"No way! She works really hard and all she gets is yucky vegetables and zero calorie health bar thingys. She needs this break"
"But all she does is stand on the spot and sing for five hours a day! She has no time get any exercise. She has to act now if she wants to lose some weight"
"Cut her some slack! So, she might have plumped up a little. She needs this break and i'm gonna make sure she can get it"
"Are you trying to fatten her up?"
"No, it's just that her body's been so thin for so long it can't take all this food. I'm sure she's just fine"
"Look at her, she's eating way more than she should"
"As soon as she sees the next summer fashions, she'll be despereate for them. I know she can do anything, especially lose a litte weight. Remember when i broke both my legs in that hockey accident and it took months for them to heal? During that time everyone just gave me treats, i ate them and because i couldn't run or do sports, i put on loads of weight. I got fatter, and frumpier, and barely noticed. And when they healed and i did sports again and i found out i wasn't good anymore because of how much i'd gained, i was gonna lock myself in my room and comfort eat myself till i grew huge. But Miley helped me through it, and if she needs it, i'll do the same for her"
"Where was i when that happened?"
"You were the one who broke them, remember!"
"Oh yeah!....You couldn't even fit into those stretchy autumn outfits!When you girls eat big, you get big!"

After a pleading call from Miley, Lily and Oliver swam back to find out what it was.
"Guys you gotta help me!" said Miley, who was cowering behind her bag of food"
"What's the problem?" said Oliver.
"It's my swimsuit! I got up and it felt really tight. When i bent down to pick up a snack, it ripped!"
Miley stood up to reveal a huge tear going from end to end of the front of her swimsuit. Fatty, loose flesh could be seen wobbling underneath.
"There's no way you can be seen like this"
"I know! This beach is so crowded! You have to find a way to hide me"
Oliver handed Miley a surfboard, which she used to cover the rip, and they escorted Miley around until she was behind the pier.
"I need a fresh swimsuit" said Miley. She handed Lily enough money for a cheap one and told her which shop to go to.
"Buy it a size 6 Small!" she called as she ran to the store.
"Size 6? Are you sure that's gonna fit you?" said Oliver
"Err, of course it's gonna fit me. It's the same size that this one is"
"But it ripped didn't it?"
"It ripped because this cotton blend isn't resistant to sea air. Heck i don't know why i bought this thing anyway. It shrinks day by day, every time i put it on it seems like it's gotten smaller"
Ten minutes later, Miley had sat down and started snacking out of her bag again. Lily returned holding a turquoise blue Size 6 swimsuit.
"Okay were gonna go back out there, you tell us when your ready"
About a quarter of an hour later Miley swam back out.
"Lily, you bought the wrong size.....again"
"I didn't buy the wrong size! It's just the fact that you've gotten..." Lily stopped herself and thought about what she was going to say next.
"Err, you've gotten...annoyed....with these stupid swimsuits! What was i thinking i should try harder!" she joked.
Miley belly flopped onto the surfboard, and pulled herself on.
"Man it's like everyday i have to squeeze into clothes like they don't want me to wear them. Everything i'm wearing seems to be getting so tight and uncomfortable. There all shrinking and i'm sick of it"
They did a bit more surfing, Miley did a bit more eating, and eventually they all went home.

After a morning of lazing around, Robbie demanded that Jackson and Miley should get up and go get some fresh air. He took them to the nearest grassy park and was ready to leave when Miley dragged them all to a free food stand promoting fast-food for the new restaurant, Splurge. Despite Robbie's protests that the food did look at little unhealthy, Miley got her way.
The food was free, but Miley's dad didn't get anything and Jackson just settle for a box of fries. Miley returned to their table, with a plate loaded with chicken, pizza, chips and sausages and a giant pretzel. She then pratically stuffed herself, as if nothing else mattered. Robbie was worried that his daughter had put on a lot of weight during her break, and hoped that it wouldn't show on Hannah.

Her once slim friend had become addicted to unhealthy foods, leading up to a weight gain that completly changed her body. Almost every part had become fatter. Her stomach had now become a big fat blob which softly bounced as she breathed. Her love handles were visible and compressed due to how tight her top was. "Oh i'm sure she's just fine. When the concert comes round those pounds will start shedding".

141112111121111111.content:
Miley,Lily and Oliver came back to the park to participate in a surprise charity fundraiser for children in developing countries. They were first in line to try out an huge army obstacle course, the one with the fastest time at the end of the day got a new Z-Phone.
"So have you been training?" said Lily.
"Training? For what?" said Miley.
"I dunno, it just seemed that you needed a little exercise"
"Why does everyone keep on saying that? Sheesh...if you guys haven't noticed, i'm actually starting to lose that bit of pudge that seems to be the centre of everyone's attention"
"You are?" said Oliver.
"Of course i am! I'm a popstar, i get this sort of thing all the time. I can easily deal with my weight"
They were about to start there race. None of them really took it seriously, but Lily was really desperate for the Z-phone. The starter blew his whistle and they started.
The first obstacle was a six foot wall with a slope at the other end. Lily got on Oliver's shoulders, surpassed the wall and then dragged Oliver over. They were about to continue when Miley called.
"GUYS! Little help here!"
Miley couldn't tug her fat frame over the wall, and it took the two of them to drag her up. She slipped down, very embarrased. The next obstacle was a big net they had to crawl under. Lily sped ahead, Oliver not far behind. Miley was half jammed under the ropes, flopping in the mud.
"Lily, go ahead, I'll get Miley" said Oliver.
Oliver waited till Miley was in reach and tugged her out the ropes. Her jacket was plastered with mud. The two of them went across a tyre walk, but Miley struggled a little on the balancing beam. Her weight was rather unneven and she accumalated several penalties. Then there was a large cargo net to climb up, which Miley was getting increasingly slow at. Miley accepted Oliver's hand and hauled her chubby body over.
"Thanks, i think we're doing really well" said Miley.
They had to slip down a fireman's pole, and although they both landed in a collapsed heap, they still got up and continued. They had to barge past a few bouncy pillars, and finally there was a thin wooden wall with a large hole.
"We're supposed to go through this one" said Oliver. He got near to the wall and dived through the hole, with his arms coming first. He landed heavily on the ground, got up and turned around. Miley got to the wall, but as she didn't fancy some hard ground to land on. She put her arms through first, lifted her legs up, placed her hands on the other side of the wall. Her head came through, as did her chest. Then....
"Hnnnnnnnnnnnnnnnnnnnnnnghhhhhhhhhhh!!!!" groaned Miley.
"What's the matter?" said Oliver.
"I'm stuck! This hole got smaller when i went through!"
"Did it?"
"Just help me out!"
Oliver grabbed her shoulders and pulled, with Miley pushing with her hands on the wood. Her legs flailed hopelessly on the other side. There was almost a popping sound as the rest of Miley was pulled through. Miley's stomach bounced back and rippled when she hit the ground.
"Come on Miley, just a hundred metre sprint!"
Miley got up, wiped herself and began running. Although she thought she was good at sprinting, she was exhausted.
The man at the finishing post pressed the button.
"Seven minutes twelve seconds"
Miley hit the floor heavily, and unzipped her jacket, letting the fat bounce out again. Sweat poured down Miley's brow. She wiped it and dove into her snackbag, which she carried with her wherever she went. The course had never made her feel so hungry.
Lily didn't win the Z-phone, losing by about five seconds. She was disappointed, but Miley cheered her up by inviting them to go to the concert with her. It was in three days.....

14111211112111111111.content:
The next day, Miley was locked up in her room again, with only packets and boxes of delivered food to comfort her. She picked up the paper that had been left by her doorside. She sat on her bed and let the paper rest on her rolls of fat. Her eyes shot to the front page, giving her a reminder about what happened last night.

Has Hannah gotten fatter?

Critics and fans were bewilidered last night by a concert appearance by teen pop sensation Hannah Montana. Dressed in overly tight tops and squeezing jeans to cover up what had happened, Hannah sung perfectly, but later in the concert her outfit burst off to reveal a shockingly large weight gain.
Hannah, the once thin fifteen year-old female singer, had taken a two month break from popstar activities in order to relax. It is believed that during then, she may have gorged on high-fat foods which made her chubby and fat. Her unhealthy diet made itself shown when her top burst off to reveal a new fattened body, shocking fans.
Critics were stunned, and after writing positive notes on her singing, began cracking down on her "new look". A review by the famous critic Henry Ragnarrson follows...
"Amazed to see the slim Hannah somehow fatten up during her break. Desperate need for her to lose weight, as it could lead to an end to her career. Worried other fans may try to copy her new image, but i'm very sure fat thighs, chubby cheeks and a huge rolling stomach cannot be popular."
Fast-food giants Splurge also came under criticism for increasing the weight of many American children. It is a theory that Hannah could have been one of their many victims. All in all, it has been agreed that Hannah is now very fat, and must start a diet before her interview with Mikayla on the Colin Lassiter show.
Miley dropped the paper and lifted her shirt. Instead of a flat stomach like she was used to, a groaning blobby gut had replaced it. She screamed.
"No wonder all my clothes don't fit" shouted Miley. She got up and snorted when she wobbled a little. Then she walked onto the scale. She remembered that last time she weighed herself, she'd been a healthy 9 stone, or 126 pounds. The scale crept up.
115....125...135....145....155..170.....it ground to a halt.
"170 pounds! Thats three a half stone extra! I've gotten so fat!"
Miley looked at herself in the mirror. She saw a fifteen year old girl with long girly brown hair and a chubby face. Her arms and legs were encased in a deep, warm, soft layer of fat. Her butt felt like a blob, and rolls of fat bulged around her midsection.
"I hate it! I hate all of it! It's not me!" shouted Miley. She slapped her stomach around, but the pounds were going nowhere. She felt like a fat blubbery pig, and knew she couldn't be seen like this next to Mikayla tomorrow. She lay down on her front on her bed, feeling every inch of her fat and hating all of it.
Then the doorbell rang..

143212.content:
Mikayla walked into the restaurant, flash bulbs snapping all around her as the paparazzi took photographs, pausing periodically to pose for the camera as she strutted inside, the doors closing as she walked over to an empty table, sitting in a huge, throne-like chair, plush and luxurious. She could already smell the food cooking in the kitchen, and she pattered her flat stomach, reaching for a glass of milkshake placed conveniently to her right, taking a series of huge gulps in an attempt to sate her hunger. She looked around for a waiter, alone in the dining area, but instead, a waiter simply came out, carrying a platter with two big, juicy burgers resting upon it, a tureen of fries in the middle.

“Bon Appetit,” the waiter said, a gleam in his eye, and she reached for the first burger, struggling to get her hands around the greasy mass, bringing it to her lips to take the first bite. As soon as the juice hit her mouth, she took a massive bite, sending grease running down her chin, and her eyes widened, a second bite instantly following the first, then a third, then a fourth. With her other hand, she grabbed some fries, dunking them in ketchup before cramming them inside, in between mouthfuls of burger and cheese. She looked up to see other plates being brought to her, a huge, over-laden pizza gleaming with cheese and toppings, battered chicken drumsticks in a big silver bowl, a string of sausages wrapped in bacon.

Finishing her burger, she wiped the grease from her lips with the back of her hand and reached for the pizza, the slice bending under the weight of cheese and toppings, and dropped it into her mouth, taking a second slice with her other hand and alternating between the two. Then the chicken, her teeth methodically stripping the flesh from the bone, the latter dumped back into the bucket as she finished each piece. A gleaming fork stabbed the first sausage, the fat oozing from it as she took bite after bite, her eyes rolling back in extasy as she finished each one.

She looked down at her stomach, pressing against her shirt, the buttons straining under the load, but she didn’t care. Another plate had been dropped in front of her, a huge omelette, made with at least a dozen eggs and loaded with cheese. That came with a spoon, and she started to shovel the greasy mass into her mouth, barely waiting to breathe between each bite. Half a dozen huge glasses of milkshake had been placed by her side, and her slippery hands poured each one into her lips, some of it spilling into her burgeoning double chin as she gulped, chewed and swallowed. The first button popped as her belly expanded, the second following shortly after, allowing her stomach to start to expand unhindered.

Another burger, another pizza. The fries were topped up, some spilling out onto the table, and she shovelled fistfuls of the salt-laden snack into her mouth, finishing the pizza as a loud report announced that the seam of her pants had split, her butt growing wider, forcing the fabric apart. She paused for a moment, looking at the feast still lying before her, then returned to her gorge, taking the last of the chicken and shovelling the remains of the omelette into her mouth. As she ate the final sausage, she sat back on her chair, panting for breath, her hands resting on her bloated, greasy belly. The waiters ran into the room, rapidly clearing the plates away, and she reached for the arm rests, planning to stand, worrying what the cameras would show when she left.

Her mind was changed when the waiters returned, each of them carrying a portion of her gargantuan dessert. First, two plates of pastries, covered in cream and chocolate, then a trio of sundaes, tall spoons sticking out of each one, and a massive jug of soda, and a pair of cheesecakes in the middle. She reached for the pastries, stuffing them into her mouth one at a time, heedless of the cream oozing out of the sides, then shovelled the sundaes into her plump lips, every bite adding to her waistline as she spread out, filling the throne, her belly rolling over her lap, her arms and fingers fatter, her butt bulging from waves of rippling fat. She quickly finished the desserts, but as she took the last bite of cheesecake, the waiters returned with the final course. A three-tier cake, chocolate and vanilla, smothered in cream with candy bars sticking out of it like candles, the very sight of the calorific treat enough to set her juicy lips watering. They placed it in front of her, another waiter handing her a huge spoon, and she began to feed.

The spoon sufficed at the start, but after a few moments, she resorted to her hands, ripping and tearing at the cake as she crammed it into her mouth, her stomach swelling rapidly, her ankles turning into cankles, thick and fat, cream and chocolate smeared across her face in her desperate need to feed, to indulge. She gasped for breath as she took the candy bars in a single bite, the last of her buttons snapping free to reveal her bulging, flabby belly, rolls upon rolls of fat as she finally finished the cake, sprawling back on her throne, panting from the exertion, her fat hands resting on her mighty stomach, slowing falling and rising, jiggling with each breath.

Then the waiters returned, two of them removing the platter, another wiping the remains of the feast from her face. She struggled in her chair, but before she could rise, Hannah came walking in, a smile on her face, followed by Aunt Dolly, the latter carrying another platter loaded with eclairs and cream cakes.

“Oh, honey, you’re just wasting away,” Dolly said. “Let me feed my little muffin.”

“No,” Mikayla replied, but Dolly stuffed an éclair into her mouth, then a cream cake, and against her will, she ate, greedily taking the food. Hannah walked over to the doors, pushing them open, the paparazzi bursting inside with cameras at the ready, recording the moment to gluttony and indulgence that Mikayla had become, a huge ball of fat sprawled on a throne, eagerly and endlessly gorging on everything in sight…

1542112.content:
Rachel fidgeted in her seat, anxiously glaring at the front door. She expected her sister to come barging in at any moment.

Gripped in her hands was a dinner roll, large bites taken out of it that evidenced her discomfort. She brushed the rust colored hair out of her eyes, finding something to hopefully occupy her time even for the slightest second. Today was just going to be another Thanksgiving, except this one would be bearable. Ross' parents couldn't make it, her own parents both had plans, and her older sister was out of state. Monica and Chandler had their own dinners to prepare, Phoebe was eating with Mike's family, and Joey was in California. Yep. Bearable. Accept for the unwanted attendance of her little sister Jill, who had only grown more unbearable in the past few years (since her one-time appearance)

"Rach, are you ok?" Ross leaned in across the dinner table, he could tell that his wife of six years was incredibly nervous, and he understood why; this WAS the first time that either of his sister-in-laws had announced that they were going to stop by to see them for Thanksgiving. Or at all. Ross was actually pretty satisfied with their lackluster attendance records, it kept the both of them sane around the holidays.

Rachel turned to her adoring husband and flashed a quick, unconvincing smile, "Hm, oh yeah just great hun!" she answered, forcing another large bite of the dinner roll through her lips, "Jusht perfect!"

"When's Aunt Jill gonna get here?" Emma impatiently queried from the far end of the table

"Oh, I'm sure she'll be here soon honey." Rachel managed to say as she nervously scratched at her tight jeans. "Damn, I knew I should've skipped lunch!"

Rachel was so embarrassed! She just knew what was going to happen, her skinny little twig sister was going to barge into her happy home and talk about her excitingly rich life, amaze Emma and brainwash her into thinking that she was the best aunt a girl could have, and keep her up until 1 in the morning telling her stories about when she and her sisters were young. And then there was Rachel. Not only did she not have an exciting career, since she was demoted for a "Man-Bag Fiasco" at the firm several years ago, and then fired for large amounts of "business expenses" that happened to show up in her closet at home, but on top of everything, there was a certain aesthetic glitch in her appearance...

Her curly headed hubbie grabbed her by the hand, "Hey, Rachel if this is about the weight thing, I-" Rachel cut him off, "What weight thing?!" she was always pretty frantic in the avoidance of this particular subject, "You mean those extra 20 pounds you've been carrying around since last Christmas, I don't think she'll notice that!" she quickly pat Ross' accumulated paunch underneath the table.

"Haha," Emma chuckled, "Daddy's fat." Ross turned away slightly as he nervously bashfully his shirt, trying to hide his stomach.

What Rachel was trying to desperately keep quiet in the house was her 340 pound frame, gaining weight steadilly after she was forced to work at a desk job and skyrocketing after she was fired. All of her friends had gained a little, as mature settled-down folk often do, but they all tended to poke fun at Rachel's exponential weight gain. And, what made it worse was that very little of it went to her breasts, giving her an ass the size of Manhattan with unbalancing breasts. Rachel cursed her mother every chance she got for those inherited hips of hers.

Rachel reached for another dinner roll as the doorbell rang, "I'll get it!" Emma excitedly bounded from her seat and sprinted towards the door. This was it, the moment of truth. Rachel swallowed hard and tightened her already vice-like grip on Ross's hand. She had the strongest craving for that turkey; comfort eating would do her little good now...

Emma hurried to the door:

"Ooh, hi Emma!"

As expected, Jill's thin little body wiggled herself into the kitchen in the most glamorous and expensive outfit she could find. Still hadn't changed a bit. Her brainless blonde sister had gotten married to some rich doctor a few years ago. Rachel was invited to the wedding, but Jill misspelled Ross and Emma's names, so she decided to stay home and eat some cake to make up for it (that was all she was pretty much going to do anyway) And besides, she just divorced him and took all his money.

Jill turned to Ross and greeted him with the standard greeting for someone you haven't seen in four years and could barely remember, let alone care, what their name is. "Hi, it's been so long!" Rachel could recognize her fake smile from a mile away. She fumingly bit into her dinner roll as she watched her younger sister barge into her home completely untouched by time.

Then, she turned to Rachel. "Ohmi- um, Hi!" Jill paused awkwardly, "Rachel?"

The bigger sister gave a sarcastic smile and swallowed, "Hi Jill." she said dryly. She could actually see Jill look her over from big fat top to bigger fatter bottom.

Ross, sensing the tension, decided to break the entire minute of silence that followed. "So... let's eat!" he squeaked nervously

"Yeah...eat." Jill stressed the last word
---------

"It was so nice of Monica to send us a pumpkin pie!" Rachel did her best to make conversation, "Although, I could have done without the postage stamp in the middle..."

"That was Uncle Chandler, he promised to send me one from every state he visits, ever!"

Ross examined the stamp, "Huh, this one says it's from New York." he shrugged and put it back down. "Hey, Monica's the traveler with her big Mocholate Business, Chandler just sits at home and comes up with ideas." Rachel jeered, lifting a big piece of pumpkin pie to her mouth.

"Oh, and what's wrong with that?" Jill asked in a mock tone, "I don't have a job."

Ross waved his fork arbitrarily and swallowed, "No, he's got a job, but all it really requires is the left side of your brain." His poor attempt at dumbing it down for Jill still recieved a no, she just looked at him like he was still the biggest geek this side of Manhattan. Unfortunately, Rachel and Emma had the same look on their faces.

"You know... the creative side of your brain?", Ross dragged it out slowly. No positive response. Jill pushed her plate back, "Well, I think I'm done." she glared at her half-empty plate. Ross pushed his plate back too, "Yeah Rach, I'm stuffed."

Rachel looked a little offended, but didn't touch on it. "Alright, well Emma and I aren't done, right Emma?" she turned to her daughter, who was already on her feet and heading to the TV room. Rachel still had a little room, but decided against looking like a hog in front of her sister.

The gigantic brunette attempted to heave her hefty hindquarters from the poor, overloaded chair. "Oh no, don't get up Rach!" Jill rushed over to keep her Rachel from standing, "Don't worry about it, Ross, Emmit-er, Emma and I can just... watch TV or something!" she quickly hurried everyone out of the dining room. Rachel actually heard her younger sister whisper, "Oh my GAWD, she's huge!"
--------

Rachel angrily stuffed some turkey in her mouth, "Huge huh?" she whimpered, "I don't see Miss High-and-Mighty giving birth and having a kid, and a desk job, and-and, UGH!!" she stuffed another large bite of pie into her mouth.

Rachel had practically cleared the table, something most upset woman of her size could do when comfort eating. "And now, she's probably ohmigawding about how fat her sister is!" she stuffed more food into her kraut, "Well, why doesn't SHE just move into the real world where there's a pizza place on every corner claiming to be 'The Original Ray's Pizza'!"

Rachel's already stretched sweater was already testing it's limits, and her pants were suffocatingly tight, but the only thing Rachel could do to think was to eat her troubles away! "I mean, come into the real world Jill!" she snorted, "We can't all stay immature little 20-somethings drinking coffee forever!"

As a sign that Rachel should perhaps stop, she ran out of food. She panted heavily, still crying a little. And then it hit her... she ate ALL that food! All of it!

Jill walked down the hall laughing her fake laugh, "Oh haha, that plutonium!" as she desperately tried to get away from Ross' special brand of humor. "Oh hey Rach!" she did her best to avoid looking directly at her fat ass sister, "I'm just gonna... y'know... leave."

Rachel sobbed, and Jill must've finally realized that she was in distress. "Oh... Rach, what's wrong?"

Rachel glared at Jill and managed to blubber something out that sounded like, "What do you mean what's wrong?!" Jill, grown literate in the language of sobbing emotional women due to a life of immaturity, responded, "What? If you're not gonna tell me what's the matter, I'll just leave."

"You! You come in here all skinny and I'm all... HUGE!"

"Yeah, you are pretty big." Jill gaped at her sister's enormous thighs, hips, and ass, "Like, bigger than your fat friend Moesha."

"Her name is Monica." Rachel quickly corrected, wiping her chubby cheeks. "How do you do it?!" she quickly asked obviously frazzled, "I mean, I've only been a stay at home mom for four years, and I've gained 130 pounds, not counting the 60 when I got stuck at a desk!"

"Oh, poor baby..." Jill said soothingly as she pat Rachel on the back...

154222222121.content:
Summer was almost over in Point Place, Wisconsin, beginning to make way for the fall. It had been a near-perfect one, with long, sunny days that made you feel like anything was possible, the promise inherent in each day only exceeded by the next.

Despite this, the gang, including Donna, had spent most of their vacation hanging out in Eric's basment. Hyde had found a new 'incense' dealer, and he was now getting his hands on, to use the industry term, 'some primo shit'. Donna hadn't really been overly into the wacky tobaccy, but this stuff provided a warm, giggly high she had never experienced before. Unfortunately, it also offered her another new sensation: the munchies.

Unlike with her previous bouts of experimentation, this new product really hit her hard in the hunger department. After a day-long session in the smoke-filled basement, the redhead would come home for dinner starved. A nice big dinner later, the feeling would usually abate. But as time went on she found it took more and more to satisfy her hunger. First it was bigger helpings, then extra helpings, then extra extra helpings. Before long, Donna would often have to pig out at dinner before retiring to the couch with a bag of potato chips or a box of Twinkies.

"It's fine," she would tell herself between binges "It's summer.Q I deserve to relax a little." it wasn't her usual level-headed attitude, but she was usually fairly groggy from the weed.

Of course, all this indulgence had a startling effect on her waistline. Her stomach, once flat and toned, bloated out into a literal 'pot' belly, and usually poked out slghty from beneath her shirt. There was a little extra jiggle in her boobs as well, along with some extra padding in her rear. After a mammoth Fourth of July feast ( Two steaks, three cheeseburgers, four hotdogs and, while everyone else had been watching the fireworks, an entire apple pie.), Donna had, to her dismay, been unable to button her jeans. By August, she couldn't even pull her jeans up over her meaty thighs and ass, and had had to resort to wearing sweatpants.

All the while she knew shevhad been putting on weight, but she'd convinced herself that it wasn't that much, and that she would lose it all easily before school resumed. But now it was August 29, the last weekend of summer, and Donna was standing in her underwear on her bathroom weighing scales, staring disbelievingly at the number.

"212 pounds!?"

Donna couldn't believe it. How could she have gained over 90 pounds in one summer? She looked in the mirror, trying to locate the source of the weight. Embarrassingly, it was hard to pin it down on one culprit.
Her breasts were straining her bra, so large had they grown, and if she turned slightly she could see her once firm butt engulfing the material of her underwear. She rubbed her gut, Her most prominent feature, which stuck out over the waistband of her white panties. Even as she did so it grumbled hungrily, despite having consumed an entire tray of lasagna less than forty minutes ago.

Donna groaned, sitting down on the edge of the bath.

"What am I going to do?"

Her introspection was interuptted by her father's voice.

"Donna, honey, your friend Jackie's on the phone..."

1542222222212211111.content:
The Lopez house was quiet. Not for a lack of people or the problems that they endured, nor for any shortages of the seemingly weekly endeavors that the family endured. It was quiet because, like most suburban households at six thirty, it was dinner time.

Before Angie's family oriented meal plan, supper wasn't quite such a family ordeal. Sure everyone sat around and talked about their day, but for the younger two members of the household it was much more like a constant twisting of the arm. George and Benny didn't get along well to begin with, and operated even less smoothly when forced into each other's elbow room. However, after Angie's abandoned diet schedule, the members of the Lopez household seemed to enjoy the food that they had been granted much more than they had before.

The meals were different, being cooked with much less structural intention towards the diet and spared no expense on flavoring. However as a trade off, they seemed a little more sloppily done; tonight's chicken alfredo seeming both carelessly tossed and mixed. It wasn't that Angie didn't care, it was just that she didn't seem to have the energy she used to be able to pour into her dinners. But no one complained, mainly in part due to the fact that they were too busy stuffing themselves to really say anything about the lack of showmanship.

The shortage of options was still fresh in everyone's mind, only recently did Gramma Benny start showing up for the free meals again. So as a result every latino at the table indulged in whatever they were given, regardless of taste, color, or complexion. This seemed fitting; Angie was the one who was so desperate to lose weight, so why should everyone else suffer? Truth be told, everyone at the table could use a little bit of that brand of suffering right about now. Stuffed as ticks, the entire Lopez family continued eating until there was nothing left in the serving dishes.

"Urp... no more..." George slurred, rolling his eyes into the back of his head, "Can't eat... any more." His taut tummy bulged underneath his collared shirt, resting on his lap. Carmen, sitting across from her father and still dressed in her Allendale uniform, rubbed her protruding stomach in a desperate attempt to ease the radiating pain coming from her food baby. Max, becoming quite the eager eater, looked across at his sister's plate, "Hey Carmen?" he asked in a tone reeking of feigned innocence, "I know we're all full and stuff but... are you gonna eat the rest of, um, whatever that is?"

"Touch it and die... urp..." she belched lightly as she swat at his approaching hand as she forked the remaining lump of alfredo into her mouth with a pained expression on her face.

Looking for sustenance, the still-starving latino boy turned to his grandmother, who snarled and barked like a dog, snapping at him until he quit. Max sulked back down into his chair, his round tummy grumbling for more food.

However, his was not the only one. In the next room, the still forty pounds overweight Angie's own squishy tummy let out a distinct bellowing sound as she carried in the red velvet cake. From her overhead position, her full lips acted as floodgates for the drool just waiting to pour from her mouth. Her hands gripped the platter, trembling somewhat from weakness both physical and willpower. Against her own wishes, she placed cake in the center of the table. "Dessert anybody?" she asked cheerfully. The response she was met with was a chorus of groans, except for Max, who was more than eager to assist in the cake's demise.

"Oh come on guys, you've all been really good with helping me with my diet, I thought you deserved a little reward!" Benny belched, "Wrap it in tinfoil, I'll eat it later." was her curt response as she grabbed her coat, "I'm headed home, if you people feed me anymore I'm gonna pop."

"Mommy, take me with you? George said weakly before recoiling, "Never thought I'd say that, I must really be full."

"No Benny, this is for the family." she chided her mother in law, "At least let me take a piece home." Benny asked before being handed the knife. She cut herself a modest piece before heading out the back door. George refused his slice, as did Carmen; though she reserved a slice for herself in the fridge. Max was warned not to eat too much, but he wound up with a slice of his own to devour in solitude.

And with everyone's departure, Angie had been left alone with her creation.

Having been sticking to her diet plan, Angie had already lost ten pounds over the course of little over a week. While not healthy for her, the results didn't lie. Her jeans not only fit better, they fit period. Her cheeks were smaller, and the belly rolls she had gained were shrinking. However, this came at the price of living on peanuts (pretty much literally).

The plump latina lady's lips quivered as she stared down the neatly sliced confection, her lack of willpower not even striking as an issue in her mind. She couldn't see, think, hear, or care about anything else right now but food. That food. She wanted it so badly, but the trade wasn't worth it. To be one of those gross, fat women who practically lived at home in sweatpants and their tummies stretching out their shirts. It made her shiver. However, the red velvet sitting atop the dining room table, left nearly perfectly symmetrical by the precise incisions her family had cut, was calling to her. And that piece that Max took made it look so uneven, and another piece gone would make it even...

That was all the overfed housewife needed.

She quickly grabbed at a knife and fork, cutting deep into the surface of the cake. She quickly sliced off the uneven part and plopped it onto her plate, where it was almost immediately shoved into her mouth. A low "Mmmmm!" escaped her lips as she squirmed in ecstasy. It was so flaky, so creamy, so... tasty!

Another slice wouldn't hurt? She'd been really good lately. Even more, why not- three's a party! Five slices, well maybe just a little more couldn't hurt! She didn't even notice that at slice seven, the only thing left in the pan was crumbs. She just happily waddled out of the room and dunked the pan into the sink, Carmen's slice laid out to die by the hand of her fork...
